value.package.json:
{
  "name": "vite_react_shadcn_ts",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "npm-run-all clean generate:build-info generate:articles download:repo-images build:client build:ssr prerender publish:docs optimize:images generate:seo generate:video-sitemap",
    "build:update": "npm-run-all clean generate:build-info generate:articles download:repo-images fetch:youtube build:client build:ssr prerender publish:docs optimize:images generate:seo generate:video-sitemap",
    "build:ci": "npm-run-all clean generate:build-info generate:articles download:repo-images build:client build:ssr prerender publish:docs optimize:images generate:seo generate:video-sitemap",
    "build:docs": "cross-env VITE_BASE_PATH=/mark-hazleton-s-notes/ VITE_SITE_URL=https://markhazleton.github.io/mark-hazleton-s-notes SITE_URL=https://markhazleton.github.io/mark-hazleton-s-notes npm run build:ci",
    "build:client": "vite build",
    "build:ssr": "vite build --ssr src/entry-server.tsx --outDir docs/server",
    "build:dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite build --mode development",
    "build:prod": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "lint:fix": "eslint . --fix",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "clean": "rimraf docs",
    "prebuild": "npm run clean",
    "fetch:youtube": "node src/scripts/fetch-youtube-videos-cached.mjs",
    "fetch:youtube:force": "node src/scripts/fetch-youtube-videos.mjs",
    "generate:articles": "node src/scripts/generate-articles-json.mjs",
    "generate:build-info": "node src/scripts/generate-build-info.mjs",
    "generate:seo": "node src/scripts/generate-seo-assets.mjs",
    "generate:video-sitemap": "node src/scripts/generate-video-sitemap.mjs",
    "download:repo-images": "node src/scripts/download-repository-images.mjs",
    "optimize:images": "node src/scripts/optimize-images.mjs",
    "add:video": "node src/scripts/add-video-to-article.mjs",
    "migrate:frontmatter": "node src/scripts/migrate-to-frontmatter.mjs",
    "migrate:frontmatter:dry-run": "node src/scripts/migrate-to-frontmatter.mjs --dry-run",
    "prerender": "node src/scripts/prerender.mjs",
    "publish:docs": "node src/scripts/publish-docs.mjs",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
    "test:build": "npm-run-all clean build preview"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "sharp": "^0.34.5",
    "@radix-ui/react-aspect-ratio": "^1.1.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-avatar": "^1.1.11",
    "@radix-ui/react-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu": "^2.1.16",
    "@radix-ui/react-hover-card": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-label": "^2.1.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-toast": "^1.2.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-tooltip": "^1.2.8",
    "@tanstack/react-query": "^5.90.20",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "cmdk": "^1.1.1",
    "embla-carousel-react": "^8.6.0",
    "input-otp": "^1.4.2",
    "lucide-react": "^0.563.0",
    "next-themes": "^0.4.6",
    "prismjs": "^1.30.0",
    "react": "^19.2.4",
    "react-day-picker": "^9.13.1",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.4",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.71.1",
    "react-markdown": "^10.1.0",
    "react-resizable-panels": "^4.6.2",
    "react-router-dom": "^7.13.0",
    "recharts": "^3.7.0",
    "remark-gfm": "^4.0.1",
    "sonner": "^2.0.7",
    "tailwind-merge": "^3.4.0",
    "vaul": "^1.1.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4.1.18",
    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.19",
    "@types/node": "^25.2.2",
    "@types/react": "^19.2.13",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.2.3",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react-swc": "^4.2.3",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.24",
    "cross-env": "^10.1.0",
    "eslint": "^9.39.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^7.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.5.0",
    "globals": "^17.3.0",
    "lovable-tagger": "^1.1.13",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "rimraf": "^6.1.2",
    "sass": "^1.97.3",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.18",
    "terser": "^5.46.0",
    "tsx": "^4.21.0",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.54.0",
    "vite": "^7.3.1",
    "vite-plugin-compression": "^0.5.1",
    "yt-dlp-wrap": "^2.3.12"
  }
}
